dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The President was just briefed on Kaspi.kz's latest numbers, and honestly, the scale is staggering.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The President was just briefed on the website 's latest numbers, and honestly, the scale is staggering.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President was updated on the results of Kaspi.kz and its plans to create new services to help develop small and medium-sized businesses in the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, the 750,000 entrepreneurs they're supporting now—that's a huge jump, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, the seven hundred fifty thousand entrepreneurs they're supporting now-that's a huge jump, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the information presented to the Head of State, today about 700 thousand domestic entrepreneurs are developing their businesses using technologies from Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And get this—15 trillion tenge in non-cash transactions just in the first half of 2024.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And get thisminus fifteen trillion tenge in non-cash transactions just in the first half of twenty twenty four.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In just the first 6 months of 2024, non-cash payments for goods and services amounted to 12 trillion tenge and 150 thousand individual entrepreneurs were registered.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: 15 trillion? That's… uh, that's an almost unbelievable figure for a six-month span.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: fifteen trillion? That's... uh, that's an almost unbelievable figure for a six-month span.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it's not just payments. They've onboarded 175,000 new individual entrepreneurs through their platform too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it's not just payments. They've onboarded one hundred seventy five thousand new individual entrepreneurs through their platform too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In just the first 6 months of 2024, non-cash payments for goods and services amounted to 12 trillion tenge and 150 thousand individual entrepreneurs were registered.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That streamlined registration system must be working wonders. I mean, reducing barriers like that really does encourage small business growth.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That streamlined registration system must be working wonders. I mean, reducing barriers like that really does encourage small business growth.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And the collaboration with government agencies on tax payments—over 1.3 trillion tenge processed digitally.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And the collaboration with government agencies on tax payments-over one point three trillion tenge processed digitally.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over the first 6 months of 2024, more than 1.1 trillion tenge in taxes and other payments to the budget were made in this way.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which, you know, makes everything more efficient for everyone. Less paperwork, faster compliance.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, you know, makes everything more efficient for everyone. Less paperwork, faster compliance.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The President seemed especially impressed with how they're expanding into rural communities now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The President seemed especially impressed with how they're expanding into rural communities now.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, that's key. Reaching those underserved areas can totally transform local economies.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, that's key. Reaching those underserved areas can totally transform local economies.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's a model of public-private partnership done right, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a model of public-private partnership done right, honestly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And you can see the President's support for the shareholders—like, full endorsement of their direction.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And you can see the President's support for the shareholders-like, full endorsement of their direction.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President noted the importance of further assistance to small and medium-sized businesses in Kazakhstan and in this regard expressed his support to the shareholders of Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, he really emphasized fostering that entrepreneurial ecosystem nationwide.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, he really emphasized fostering that entrepreneurial ecosystem nationwide.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President noted the importance of further assistance to small and medium-sized businesses in Kazakhstan and in this regard expressed his support to the shareholders of Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you wonder what other sectors could benefit from that kind of tech-driven approach.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you wonder what other sectors could benefit from that kind of tech-driven approach.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. If they keep this up, the impact could be even broader in the next few years.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. If they keep this up, the impact could be even broader in the next few years.
